com.xilinx.rapidwright.eco

Class ECOPlacementHelper

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.eco.ECOPlacementHelper

  • public class ECOPlacementHelper
extends Object
    Class for aiding with ECO placement activities. e.g. given a SLICE site, methods are provided to spiral out to find other SLICEs and allowing them to be queried for unused LUT/FF BELs.

    • Field Detail

        public static final Set<String> ultraScaleFlopNames

    • Constructor Detail

      • ECOPlacementHelper

        public ECOPlacementHelper(Design design,
                          Map<Net,Set<SitePinInst>> deferredRemovals)
        Constructor for ECOPlacementHelper class.
        Parameters:
        design - Design to be analyzed.
        deferredRemovals - An optional map populated with the site pins marked for removal. Sites with pins queued for removal will be treated as if the pin was already removed for the purposes of finding unused flops.

    • Method Detail

      • getUnusedFlop

        public BEL getUnusedFlop(SiteInst siteInst,
                         Net clk)
        Given a SiteInst and a clock net, find an unused flop BEL that can host a new cell. This flop BEL will have its bypass pin ([A-H](X|_I)) available. Assumes that CE and SR of flop to be placed is going to be held at VCC and GND respectively.
        Parameters:
        siteInst - SiteInst object to search inside.
        clk - Desired clock net for flop cell.
        Returns:
        Unused flop BEL.

      • getUnusedFlop

        public BEL getUnusedFlop(SiteInst siteInst,
                         Net clk,
                         Net ce,
                         Net rst)
        Given a SiteInst and a clock net, find an unused flop BEL that can host a new cell. This flop BEL will have its bypass pin ([A-H](X|_I)) available.
        Parameters:
        siteInst - SiteInst object to search inside.
        clk - Desired clock net for flop cell.
        ce - Desired clock enable net for flop cell (null for VCC).
        rst - Desired reset net for flop cell (null for GND).
        Returns:
        Unused flop BEL.

      • getUnusedLUT

        public BEL getUnusedLUT(SiteInst siteInst)
        Given a SiteInst, find an unused LUT BEL that can host a new LUT6 cell.
        Parameters:
        siteInst - SiteInst object to search inside.
        Returns:
        Unused LUT6 BEL.

      • getCentroidOfPoints

        public static Site getCentroidOfPoints(Device device,
                                       List<Point> points,
                                       Set<SiteTypeEnum> targetSiteTypes)

      • getCentroidOfNet

        public static Site getCentroidOfNet(Net net,
                                    Set<SiteTypeEnum> targetSiteTypes)

      • spiralOutFrom

        public static Iterable<Site> spiralOutFrom(Site site)
        Given a home Site, return an Iterable that yields the neighbouring sites encountered when walking outwards in a spiral fashion. To be used in conjunction with ECOPlacementHelper.getUnusedLUT(SiteInst) and ECOPlacementHelper.getUnusedFlop(SiteInst, Net).
        Parameters:
        site - Originating Site.
        Returns:
        Iterable of neighbouring sites.

      • spiralOutFrom

        public static Iterable<Site> spiralOutFrom(Site site,
                                           PBlock pblock)
        Given a home Site, return an Iterable that yields the neighbouring sites encountered when walking outwards in a spiral fashion. To be used in conjunction with ECOPlacementHelper.getUnusedLUT(SiteInst) and ECOPlacementHelper.getUnusedFlop(SiteInst, Net).
        Parameters:
        site - Originating Site.
        pblock - Also check to ensure the proposed sites are inside the provided pblock.
        Returns:
        Iterable of neighbouring sites.

      • spiralOutFrom

        public static Iterable<Site> spiralOutFrom(Site site,
                                           PBlock pblock,
                                           boolean exclude)
        Given a home Site, return an Iterable that yields the neighbouring sites encountered when walking outwards in a spiral fashion. To be used in conjunction with ECOPlacementHelper.getUnusedLUT(SiteInst) and ECOPlacementHelper.getUnusedFlop(SiteInst, Net).
        Parameters:
        site - Originating Site.
        pblock - Also check to ensure the proposed sites are inside the provided pblock.
        exclude - If this flag is true, any sites inside the pblock are excluded.
        Returns:
        Iterable of neighbouring sites.
